name: Corazón de Lolita
description: Silky texture with ripe berry notes, lifted spice, and a long finish.
notes: Red fruit, floral, semi-sweet, smooth finish

name: Honney Conti XO Royal Brandy
description: Exquisite blend with deep amber color, vanilla, and spice — perfect for collectors.
notes: Honeyed layers, toasted oak, dried fruit complexity

name: Sunny Land Single Malt S25 Scotch
description: 25-year-old single malt whisky from Scotland, aged to perfection.
notes: Smoky, oaky, with hints of dried fruit and spice

name: Anderra Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
description: Premium red wine from Chile, rich in color and depth of flavor.
notes: Blackcurrant, dark chocolate, tobacco, long finish

name: Caribbean Blaze Blended Bourbon 18
description: Bold American bourbon with a smooth, fiery finish.
notes: Caramel, vanilla, oak, with a warm, spicy finish

name: Lolita Ready-to-Drink Red Wine Cans
description: Convenient, on-the-go red wine experience with bold flavor.
